Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can show a device using a string between two cups to communicate sound over a distance.
The student can demonstrate how the device uses sound to transmit a message from one student to another.
The student can illustrate how the string needs to be tight to effectively transmit sound.
The student can depict the device in a way that solves the problem of communicating over a long distance.
The student can include features in the drawing that show how people use simple devices to communicate.
The student can represent the importance of using the provided materials to construct the design solution.
